startFailed._m: The BankID app couldn’t be found on your device. Please install it and order a BankID from your internet bank. Install the app from {{ platform | select(platforms) }} or https://install.bankid.com.

codes.userSign: Enter your security code in the BankID app for identification.
codes.started: Searching for BankID, it may take a little while... If a few seconds have passed and still no BankID has been found, you probably don’t have a BankID which can be used for this identification/signing on this computer. If you have a BankID card, please insert it into your card reader. If you don’t have a BankID you can order one from your internet bank. If you have a BankID on another device you can start the BankID app on that device.
codes.alreadyInProgress: An identification or signing in for this social security number has already been started. Please try again.
codes.expiredTransaction: The BankID app is not responding. Please check that the program is started and that you have internet access. If you don’t have a valid BankID you can get one from your bank. Try again.
codes.certificateErr: The BankID you are trying to use is revoked or too old. Please use another BankID or order a new one from your internet bank.

startFailed._m: The BankID app couldn’t be found on your device. Please install it and order a BankID from your internet bank. Install the app from {{ platform | select(platforms) }} or https://install.bankid.com.

register.title: Account
register.instructions: Since this is your first time using the app, we would like to ask you for your contact information.

start.title: How may we assist you today?

menuItems.child: Book a call for a child

onBehalfOf.title: Information about the child
onBehalfOf.personalNumberRequired: A Swedish social security number for the child is required.
onBehalfOf.personalNumberWrongFormat: Social security number is not recognized.
onBehalfOf.samePersonalNumberAsLoggedIn: You are logged into the app with the same social security number as you entered above.
onBehalfOf.bookForMe: Want to book a visit for yourself?

contactInformation.title: Contact information
contactInformation.description: You can use this form to update your contact information.
contactInformation.phoneNumberInvalid: The phone number that you have entered is incorrect, please check that you have typed correctly before proceeding.
contactInformation.emailAddressInvalid: Oops, the email address you entered is not valid.
contactInformation.phoneNumberFormat: The phone number format is not recognized.

legal.title: Terms
legal.content:
# Your privacy is important
 please read about how we protect your privacy in our [terms of use](http://www.toothie.se/termsandconditions).

aestheticDentistry.title: Photos
aestheticDentistry.description: In order for us to provide you with the best help, we would like you to take a set specific photos of your teeth.
aestheticDentistry.reviewDescription: If you would like to add any additional photos you can do so here.

images.title: Photos
images.description: You can add photos that might be useful.
images.permissionsRequiredMessage: Open your device's settings and grant Toothie access to the camera and photo library.

androidCameraPermissionOptions.title: Allow access to camera.
androidCameraPermissionOptions.message: We need your permission to access the camera.

cameraInstructions.title: Tips and instructions
cameraInstructions.intro: Make sure you have proper light where you take the pictures. If the light is not enough, you can always turn on the camera flash.
cameraInstructions.cameraSwitchTitle: Is it hard to see what you're shooting?
cameraInstructions.cameraSwitchIntro: Try switching between the various cameras in the unit.
cameraInstructions.cameraSwitchAdditional: Use the button at the bottom right to switch between the various cameras of the unit.

notifications.title: Notifications
notifications.description: Notifications are used to inform you of incoming calls.
notifications.unknown: Make sure you have enabled notifications so we can reach you when it's time.
notifications.disabled: Allow the app to send notifications so you don't miss the call.
notifications.partial: Check the app settings and fully enable notifications so you don't miss the call.

paymentProviders.noSwish: To pay with Swish, the app must be installed on this device.

paymentStripe.securityInformation: Credit/debit card payments are handled in accordance with the Payment Card Industry Data Security Standards (PCI DSS). Our provider is certified as a PCI Level 1 Service Provider, the highest standard available.

paymentSwish.error: An error occurred while processing the payment.

history.title: My appointments
history.description: Here you can see your upcoming and past appointments.
history.reschedulingMessage: Your call needs to be rescheduled, tap for options on how to proceed.
history.alertMessage: Would you like to be added to the queue or cancel the call completely?

refundDescription.requested: A refund has been requested and will be processed shortly.
refundDescription.inProgress: We are currently processing the refund.
refundDescription.failed: Something went wrong when processing the refund.

upgrade.title: Required update
upgrade.explanation: Toothie is continually updated and developed for increased security, reliability and functionality.

node.existingQueuedVisit: You already have an upcoming call in the queue
node.draftNotCurrent: You initiated a booking on another device

feedback.title: Nice talking to you!
feedback.description: We would like to hear your feedback on how you experienced the call.
feedback.commentPlaceholder: Feel free to add a comment...
feedback.skipMessage: You've begun to leave feedback, are you sure you want to continue without saving?

confirmFreeVisit.title: Your call is free of charge!
confirmFreeVisit.description: Do you want to be added to the queue?

incomingCall.title: Incoming call
incomingCall.alertTitle: Do you want to dismiss this call?
incomingCall.alertMessage: It is not possible to resume a dismissed call.

questionTree.abortMessage: You are about to cancel this booking, are you sure?
